msbt.message: I was stoked to get your present! It's the time of year when stuff like this is a big help. I can't compete with your gift, but here's something in return. Hope you enjoy it.
Thanks so much for your present! Reading your letter made me realize it was a buff year for me. Here's a little something in return. I hope you have a great year!
Thanks for your present! Thanks to you, I had a fun year. I'm including a gift in return. It's something I used during a combined workout and cleaning session. It's all yours!
Your card made me look back on this year with profound feelings. With this fresh in mind, I'm going to break through my buffness meter for real next year! Keep watching!
The end of the year is such a busy time. I finished my workout, and then I read your card and had a protein shake at the same time! And then I even thought about cleaning my house! So busy!

Thanks for the year-end greetings! If I relax and lounge around, I might lose all the muscle I put on this year, and that would be a huge waste. I need to make pumping iron my top priority every year!
